channel.title: What is your worst injury?
channel.description:
My worst injury would be...I damaged a tendon in my right ankle and I had to go under knife and to this day. When I roll my ankle, it clicks. Many people sit there and look at me... It's freaky. Oh well. It's funny, it's grose. I had a couple of pins put into my ankle.
This is off topic, but my friends worst injury.. I think a broken back. He wasn't paralyzed, he hurt the vertibrae that can paralyze you, but you can get away rom it. He got away from it and is back on the bike.

item.title: What is your worst injury?
item.dc:creator: @CL1CH CL1CH
item.description:
@CL1CH wrote:

lol I was playing around my freinds on my roof well some kid pushed me so i picked him up and i drop him on his head on the roof but when i droped him i tripped on my shoe lace and fell back off the roof i fell on a bike’s handle bars i bleeding on my back lol i was funny had to get 43 stiches lolololol ;D ;D ;D :o

mine would be when i broke my arm going ff a ramp on my bike,landed alittle too wrong and when i hit ground i did a front flip on my bike then i got throne off it and the bike fell on me,was caught in part of the bike so i had to have help from a friend to get me out of it.

item.title: What is your worst injury?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

2 broken wrists.

Fell backwards off a balcony at school and broke both my wrists in like the exact spot. To my suprise they heal’d quickly and it feels like it never happened.

Only other broken bones were toes, which heal on their own pretty much.

Got knocked out one time playing rugby last year, got a week of school since I had a really bad concussion. But other then that, no injuries that I can think of.

Read full topic

item.title: What is your worst injury?
item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

when i was 7 the only thing to do was break beer bottles in the woods… welll… i was doing that and i kinda turned and tripped on one of them and cut from the beginning of my thumb to the middle of my wrist barley missed the vein.
haha funny thing was i cried… but it did not hurt i guess i was just scared… but i was scared shitless when the nurse was putting a 9 inch needle in it =@

Read full topic

item.title: What is your worst injury?
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

me, Ive had plenty of injuries lol, I race motocross & SUpercross so when you cash it kinda hurts

INJURY HISTORY:
1996-racing i was going down a streight away and someone crashed right in front of me and I flew over the handlebars and landed face first, but my left shoulder hit the ground and dislocated.

1999-racing aswell, came up short on a 85ft jump and the force broke my fight wrist in 2 places." I might still have the X-rays I could mabe upload so you can see.

2005-february-racing-did a 110ft jump someone crashed on the landing and i hit there bike as I was coming and and stopped me right away, i flew over and there broked break lever"sharp" stabbed me in my right shoulder and cut me from armpit to center of chest"still have scar"
2005-november-racing i was going threw a turn"burm" and I was going fast and a big rut cought my left foot and twisted my knee counter clock wise"tore my ACL, and messed up something else" Had reconstructive surgery on it few days later, couldnt walk for 2 months,crutches for 1 month limp"for life"

2006-May 13-racing- It was californias biggest ameuter races, I got a good started and I was leading till My thoutle got stuck wide open"stuck pinned on" and i couldnt stop and I hit a jump and over jumped everything and when I landed the force tore ALL the ligament in my right knee…May 16 Had another major reconstructive surgery on my right knee… Still recovering…

Just a few

Read full topic

item.title: What is your worst injury?
item.dc:creator: @killer_kure killer kure
item.description:
@killer_kure wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:15, topic:19784”][quote author=killer kure link=topic=30012.msg351631#msg351631 date=1161885572]
i remeber another injury i was at the doctor and this dude is stupid as shit
he injected me with this numbing stuff i dunno like 26 times…he only needed 2
so he pulled like 3 of my teeth and i was bleeding really bad as u can imagen but i was all numbed up so i didn’t notice…by the time i get home i am bleeding horribley by the end of the night i had bled prolly…2 or 3 quarts of blood from my mouth
[/quote]
You think thats bad, ive had 9 teeth pulled out by the dentist now - 5 milk and 4 adult, because my teeth just dont want to leave my mouth and on top of all of that, the bastard pulled out the wrong adult tooth[/quote]
dentist are stupid ass shit… they can never get things right the first time

Read full topic
